main event: Multiple reports of unusual flying objects were observed in Boron and Del Mar, California between July and August 1952.
interesting points: An object was reported as stationary and then disappeared after 1 minute in Boron,California., A second report in Del Mar mentioned that no aircraft intercepted the object and it was not detected by ground radar., Multiple witnesses saw the objects with descriptions of bright, star-like lights., The objects exhibited unusual flight characteristics, including making right angle turns., The sightings were conducted by trained personnel, with no confirmed identification of the objects.
witness description: trained military personnel observing unidentified flying objects
